definition: to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: No fishing off the fish people, I am afraid it is difficult to appreciate from the Mainland.
sentences.chinese: 没有钓过鱼的人，恐怕是难以领略到的。

sentences.english: You don't absorb the ideas of John Dewey the way you absorb the crooning of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能像欣赏流行歌曲那样领略杜威的思想。

sentences.english: I did not fully appreciate the beauty of Grahame's words.
sentences.chinese: 那时，我还不能完全领略格雷厄姆的文字之美。

sentences.english: However, to appreciate the beauty of Sanqingshan need to experience immersive.
sentences.chinese: 然而，要领略三清山的美还需身临其境去体验。

sentences.english: Millions of people travel each year to experience nature’s splendour.
sentences.chinese: 每年有千百万人为领略壮丽的自然风光而旅游。

sentences.english: I should come again from work by 6. Do you know where King Streetis?
sentences.chinese: 我6点钟之前会放工回来。你领略国王街在哪吗？

sentences.english: This time, I finally a taste of the "infinite beauty in the Xianfeng" feeling.
sentences.chinese: 这下，我终于领略到了“无限风光在险峰”的感觉。

sentences.english: At this point, you'll be ready to get the full benefit of these moments of contemplation.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，你会充分领略到这些沉思的益处。

sentences.english: We never learn the joy and peace of free time to just be alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们从来领略不到空闲时间的快乐和安宁，只是活着。

sentences.english: I also found out what failure is.
sentences.chinese: 我也领略到失败的滋味。

sentences.english: How about letting me show you some Shaolin martial arts skills?
sentences.chinese: 带你去领略一下少林功夫如何？

sentences.english: Moreover, The Smile of Vrah impressed the whole world through its Asian fascination.
sentences.chinese: “吴哥的微笑”，亦让世界领略了东方文明的魅力。

sentences.english: Half the fun of coming home was to come back to all the things you knew and remembered.
sentences.chinese: 回家的主要乐趣就是重新领略熟悉未忘的一切事物。

sentences.english: Today, we're going to enjoy the scenery of the ancient canal .
sentences.chinese: 今天我们要好好领略古运河的风光。

sentences.english: Plays by Plautus and Terence are available for the student who wishes to sample their quality.
sentences.chinese: 要想领略其特点，可以读普劳图斯和泰兰斯的剧本。

sentences.english: I like riding horses, and that alone to experience the grasslands of a greenish yellow.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢骑着马，独自去领略草原的那一份苍黄。

definition: to look intensively/to feast one's eyes on
to look/to have a glimpse at/to observe (sth's splendor)
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
to view/to look at/to look sth over
